title: 求救 Millenaire
author: leobasara
txt_content:
Millenaire 要用到m鍵
但是m鍵已經在minimap的mod給用了
想問可以怎麼解決 ???

replies.author: sylqiuyifeng
replies.txt_content: 改小地图的设置……开菜单就能看到

replies.author: 路邊電燈泡
replies.txt_content:
裝完小地圖後別裝村莊，先該設定，在裝村莊
我解決了加我分，我知道你大概沒權限

replies.author: Widely
replies.txt_content: 先按M打开菜单……然后点keyconfig，把第一项改成你想要的键就行了

replies.author: leobasara
replies.txt_content:
謝各位大大好心
已找到解決方法

//Config
//Keys to use for the village and quest listings
village_list_key=V
quest_list_key=L

可以改鍵
